probSummary.example: Payment debited but order not confirmed

BearerAuthorizationTokenAuth.name: Authorization
BearerAuthorizationTokenAuth.description: Supply the "accessToken" in the Authorization header as follows: "Bearer <id_token>".

internalServerError.description: An internal error happened. check the server logs.

badRequest.description: Bad Request or You need to supply the correct parameters as specified in the API docs, please check `additionalInfo` for more details

notFound.description: The server can not find the requested resource.

unauthorized.description: Indicates that the request requires user authentication information. The client MAY repeat the request with a suitable Authorization header field

forbidden.description: Unauthorized request. The client does not have access rights to the content.

schema.description: The limit parameter for pagination. No more than this number of entities will be returned, but less may be returned.
The offset parameter for pagination is 0 by default.
